column5: Fresh linens and towels will be provided for all guests, along with shampoo & conditioner. Please make yourself comfortable while you are a guest in my home. My apartment is just 2 minutes to UT, a 5-7 minute drive to downtown, and 10 minutes to the airport. There are lots of restaurants, coffee shops and bars on my street, within walking distance. Please respect my home as if it were your own.
column8: Cozy 1 bedroom in hip East Austin
